subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Season tickets for Oklahoma City’s new N.B.A. team, formerly the Seattle SuperSonics, have sold out in five days. The team chairman Clay Bennett said the last of about 13,000 Thunder season tickets were sold Friday.
snippet: Season tickets for Oklahoma City’s new N.B.A. team, formerly the Seattle SuperSonics, have sold out in five days. The team chairman Clay Bennett said the last of about 13,000 Thunder season tickets were sold Friday.
